channel.title: +1 on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +1 on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: 7 The Part of the Sacrificer in the New and Full Moon Sacrifices
item.description: 04 ‘By I sacrifice to the divine strew, may I be possessed of children’, he says; by the strew Prajapati created offspring, verily he creates offspring. ‘By sacrifice to the god Naraśansa, may I be possessed of cattle’, he says; by Naraśansa Prajapati created cattle; verily he creates cattle. ‘By sacrifice to the god, Agni Svistakrt, may I attain security through the sacrifice, having long life’, he says; verily he confers life on himself, and finds support through the sacrifice.

item.title: 8 The Rajasuya
